package.name: sreedarsh_bsslider
package.summary: Highly customizable front page slider built with bootstrap 3.3.5
package.description:
Features:
* Fully dynamic and fully responsive on all mobile devices and screen size (ie mobile, tablets, desktop etc) * All modern browsers supported. * Javascript implemented in no conflict mode * Can accomodate any number of images * Easy to install and customize; * Adjustable controls via backend configuration * No programming skills required * Easy to install and configure
